Text: Re Ref Letter dated July pst Ms Kitchen Thank you for your response and the wise words to read more HBS studies I appreciate your honest answers and sound advice I am extremely interested in Enron Broadband for opportunities this fall Do you know of anyone there I could talk to about roles for MBAs opportunities the culture and what roles MBAs play Thanks again for your time and I look forward to talking with you more Sincerely Chad Storlie Kitchen Louise p Chad Answers to questions clearly not Enron answers but my own personal views The areas you are looking at are not directly commercial and this should be something you consider Essentially you may wish to consider a consultancy company which is much more akin to your interests which are not our core competencies You need to decide whether you wish to pursue a commercial career or not decide what your risk profile is a consultant role is low reward low risk and commercial player has a highrisk reward profile Driven enthusiastic hard working highly analytical personable and motivated Not having an MBA personally I find this one simple to answer Too much occupation with trying to apply theory to practice not seeing the wood for the trees english expression Get some practical experience More case studies Harvard Business Good Luck This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to
